revised_title: Carlsbad Mineral Waters: Observations and Experiments by Jeremiah Milles
tldr: The author, Jeremiah Milles, provides a detailed account of the Carlsbad mineral waters in Bohemia, their properties, and effects on surrounding materials. He describes the two warm springs, their temperature, and the various types of incrustations formed by the waters. The author also explains the medicinal uses of these waters and the treatment process followed by patients visiting the town.
